articles.title: Newly listed stock jumps up to 8% after company's net profits increases by 106% in Q2 - Trade Brains
articles.description: This Defence stock was listed on 10th July 2023, and since the listing the stock has given 68% returns. On Tuesday this stock jumps more than 8% after reporting results for Q2 FY24. Currently, the stock is trading 10.7% away from the 52-week high.

articles.title: Rupee Closed at a Lifetime Low on Monday Amid Worries Over Oil Prices - The Wire
articles.description: The rupee closed at 83.2775 against the dollar, barely changed from its previous close, which had marked a record low. The currency hit its previous record closing low of 83.2675 on September 18.
articles.content:
New Delhi: The Indian rupee closed at a lifetime low against the US dollar on Monday (October 16) due to a surge in crude oil prices and weakening Asian currencies.

articles.title: Stock to buy today: SJVN (₹75.9): BUY - BusinessLine
articles.description: Bullish outlook for SJVN: 3% rise ends sideways consolidation, supports at ₹73.50 & ₹72.80. Price can rise to ₹82-₹83. Go long at current levels, accumulate on dips. Stop-loss at ₹71.50, trail up to ₹77 & ₹79. Exit at ₹81. Risk of loss.
